title: bookmarks are inactive
content: Hi all, all my bookmarks are inactive. they still show up in the bookmark toolbar but don't work anymore. they dont show the individual icon anymore, just the basic common one. when I right click on them they dont show properties anymore ...

title: Why firefox doesnot shows my background image?
content:
I have a website which is working fine in chrome , edge and other browser but when I went with Firefox than the background of website disappear . If I inspect to CSS and just click here and there in CSS it started appearing but if I reload the page without cookies than again it disappear . here is my CSS

.top { 

   background-image: url("../img/img.png");    background-position: center center;    background-repeat: no-repeat;    background-size: cover;    background-attachment: fixed;    height: 100%;

} URL is fine i already tested it . can anyone help me with this? I already tried

display: block;
creator: sitrabinadhikari

title: Audio Periodically Drops on HP Pavilion Gamming Laptop
content:
Hi Firefox Community,

About a month ago, I purchased a 2020 HP Pavilion Laptop. While using Firefox, the system audio periodically drops with no system acknowledgment (drivers don't know the sound dropped). This means that sound will not play in Firefox or in any other application on the PC. (The system also won't play test sounds through Control Panel) The moment I close all windows in Firefox, the audio to my system returns. Any chance this is a common issue? Does anyone know why my computer's sound unexpectedly drops from time to time? Any help is appreciated
creator: mason22571

title: Shortcut icons
content: I disabled MIcrosoft Edge to Firefox as default browser, but still get the stupid Edge icon for the shortcut links when I drag and drop from the address bar. I hate it! All the shortcuts have the same icon. Any way I can change this? "Properties>Change icon" does not fix this. Thanks.
creator: patnik98

title: why does FF insist on using https when the address is http? Please unblock http://rebirthofreason.com
content:
Dear All,

Why does FF insist on using https when the address is http? Please unblock http://rebirthofreason.com The site shows up just fine on Chrome, why not FF?

Thanks for your time!
creator: bading7777

title: Cannot set my colors in Firefox using Windows 10 with High Contrast Black mode
content: I am running Windows 10 on an HP laptop 17vy3063st 173 notebook and using the latest version of Firefox that I just downloaded. I am running Windows with the High Contrast Black mode because that seems to be the best option for my color vision. (Windows 7 seemed much better.) Anyway, I go to the Options->Colors page, uncheck use system colors, set the colors I want, and choose override the colors on the page with the always option. And, nothing happens. I do not see the colors I want. Is there some other parameter in about:preferences I need to change? Thanks for your help.
creator: ModelCitizen
